feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • webhook template tags by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/859
  • document webhook template tags by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/860
  • add dashboard api base to env vars of docker compose lite file by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/864
  • absolute url signout by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/871
  • dittofeed lite helm chart by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/872
  • add helm docs to kubernetes section by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/874
  • default DASHBOARD_API_BASE values for helm chart by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/875
  • fix floating point error in unit calculation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/876
  • fix for template title updates by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/877
  • sync message node by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/878
  • ux improvements for message node editor by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/880
  • fix worker build error by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/881
  • ui feature for sync webhook message nodes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/882
  • remove broadcast segments from ui by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/883
  • performed user property conditions by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/884
  • transfer resources script by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/885
  • skip transfer journeys when no definition by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/886
  • ensure transferred journeys are paused, with empty draft by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/887
  • performed user property conditions ux by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/888
  • don't initialize secret editor state until secret availability loaded by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/889
  • secret availability race condition fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/890
  • fix logic for coldstart webhook secret ui state by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/891
  • update self-hosting options docs by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/892
  • add slack & whatsapp webhook templates to docs by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/893
  • enable sms and webhook broadcasts by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/894
  • add manual segment types by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/895
  • don't render settings until page transition finished by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/896
  • subscription management fixes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/897
  • handle subscription management for duplicate identifiers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/898
  • process manual computed properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/899
  • only initialize kafka table with write mode by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/900
  • ensure docker compose lite file compatible with yarn 4.1.1 upgrade by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/901
  • revert docker compose lite profile by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/902
  • isolated dockerfiles yarn upgrade by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/903
  • manual segments ux by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/904
  • ensure fastify multipart registered correctly by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/906
  • restrict manual segments to root by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/907
  • pull multipart into shared plugin by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/908
  • add segments admin api by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/909
  • fix conflict between fastify plugins by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/910
  • manual segment docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/911
  • Remove unnecessary Break by @Ima8 in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/913
  • update readme branding by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/914
  • change readme product images by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/915
  • update docs favicon by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/916
  • change docs color theme by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/917
  • allow prefix matches for performed segments and user properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/918
  • blob storage config and types by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/912
  • cleanup from email attachments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/919
  • support exists operator for performed segments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/920
  • fix file user property mapping by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/921
  • fix user segment link by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/922
  • render webhook deliveries by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/923
  • address race condition in assignment writes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/925
  • docs: update README.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/924
  • performed 0 times segmentation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/926
  • add additional test case by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/927
  • pass all params to get users endpoint by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/928
  • expose content controller to admin api by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/929
  • fix: align controls in user segments table by @bhanufyi in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/930
  • add additional logging around clickhouse bootstrap by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/931
  • random bucket segment types by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/932
  • backend implementation for random bucket segmentation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/933
  • remove test only by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/934
  • random bucket segment frontend by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/935
  • optimize process assignments step by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/936
  • additional optimizations re process assignments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/937
  • fixes clickhouse syntax error in computed property workflow by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/938
  • add additional null check to getEarliestComputePropertyPeriod by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/939
  • correct logic for sync properties logic by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/940
  • make explicit that you don't need to set DASHBOARD_URL and DASHBOARD_API_BASE locally in docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/941
  • upgrade clickhouse client by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/942
  • fix type errors related to clickhouse upgrade by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/943
  • replace clickhouse host config with url by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/945
  • upgrade prisma by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/944
  • fix favicon by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/946
  • add liveness check to helm chart by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/947
  • submit logs to hyperdx by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/948
  • fixes for hyperdx logging by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/949
  • implement public logger by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/950
  • default public logs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/951
  • add journeys admin api by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/952
  • enhance transfer resources script by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/953
  • improve error handling for transfer resources by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/954
  • improve transfer resources logging by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/955
  • improve transfer resources logging further by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/956
  • update ttl by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/957
  • support less than hasbeen comparator by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/959
  • autocomplete track properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/960
  • bootstrap workflow by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/961
  • configure helm chart to use single replica clickhouse by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/962
  • resetting workspace data cli script by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/963
  • sync clear workspaces ch queries by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/964
  • document file user properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/965
  • list any of and file user properties from docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/966
  • synchronize properties docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/967
  • update docs copy by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/968
  • random bucket segment docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/969
  • improve k8s docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/970

New Contributors

  • @Ima8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/913
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/924
  • @bhanufyi made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/930

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.13...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • onboard user create if doesn't exist by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/973
  • child workspaces by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/974
  • ensure free solo on event entry journey by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/975
  • Fix event trigger sync by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/976
  • add sdk to submitting user events section by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/978
  • update docs to reference app.dittofeed subdomain by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/977
  • add admin get endpoints by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/979
  • remove join operation from windowed perform segments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/980
  • within trait segment efficiency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/981
  • disable callback from sms test by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/982
  • lint fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/983
  • compute state efficiency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/984
  • hasbeen segment efficiency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/985
  • parallelize segment and user property compute assignments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/986
  • streamline segments compute properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/987
  • ensure computed property tests order assertions by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/988
  • update sdk-web version by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/989
  • restructure public logs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/992

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • webhook broadcasts fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/998
  • abstract app entry by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/999
  • get workspace id validation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1000
  • additional validations for workspace id in api request context by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1001
  • remove dup logic for workspace id resolution by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1002
  • abstract out admin api auth by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1003
  • individual delivery method by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1005
  • configure individual message provider by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1006
  • external id workspaces by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1007
  • pass message tags to template renderer by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1008
  • handle missing single delivery by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1009
  • inherit parent workspace email/sms provider by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1010
  • gte and lt trait segment operators by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1011
  • performed numeric operators by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1012
  • process assignments concurrency limit by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1013
  • remove unused code by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1014
  • add context to webhook events by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1015
  • improved error handling ses webhook by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1016
  • fix regression in styling of email preview body in deliveries table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1017
  • explicitly pass pino pretty stream by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1018
  • filter out Null values when calculating AnyOf user properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1019
  • correct anyOf fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1020
  • fix error logging for ses by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1021
  • email template custom headers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1022
  • ses hook fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1023
  • correct tag schema for ses by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1024
  • correct type error with ses schema change by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1025
  • fix submitted ses event structure by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1026
  • fix resource delete requests by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1027
  • more ses logging by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0
